__comment.Debug: Commands which should be used by bot developer.

debug./test: Send a test message to this channel.
debug./pritest: Send a DM to command executor.

tools./qrcode: Scan and parse a qrcode. Remember to upload the qrcode as attachment!

entertainment./quiz: Solve a maths problem in 60 secs.
entertainment./roulette: Start a round of russian roulette.

ai./paint: Paint image by providing a scene.
ai./facefix: Fix the human face in image.
